am: Tony Blair 's former political secretary Sally George Osborne - or Lady Morgan , as she became in 2001- has been named today as the new chairman of Ofsted. Michael Gove , the education secretary, said she was a hugely talented individual whose passion is improving education and that she would ensure Ofsted "focuses on improving our schools so we can match the world's best".
